Welcome to Canberra Splash Zone

The ultimate destination for fun and excitement on the water!

Plan Your Visit

customSections.title: Exciting Rides and Attractions
customSections.customHTML:
Exciting Rides and Attractions

Thunder Falls

Experience the thrill of a steep drop into a splash pool below. Surrounded by lush landscapes, itâ€™s perfect for daring adventurers!

Lazy River

Float along our winding lazy river and soak up the sun. It's a tranquil retreat for families and friends who want to relax!

Kid's Splash Zone

A dedicated area for little ones to splash around safely with mini slides and water features designed for their enjoyment!

customSections.title: Planning Your Visit
customSections.customHTML:
Planning Your Visit

Hours of Operation

Monday - Sunday: 10 AM - 8 PM

Ticket Prices

Adults: $30, Children: $20, Family Pass: $80

Location

123 Water Lane, Canberra, ACT, Australia

services.title: Group Events
services.description: Book your birthday parties, school excursions, or corporate events at Canberra Splash Zone!

services.title: Food & Beverage
services.description: Enjoy a variety of food options from snacks to full meals at our park's cafes.

services.title: Season Passes
services.description: Get unlimited access to fun for the whole season with our affordable season passes!

testimonials.name: Sarah M.
testimonials.content: We had an amazing family day out! The kids loved every second at the park, especially the slides!

testimonials.name: James T.
testimonials.content: Best water park experience I've ever had! Clean, safe, and tons of fun!

testimonials.name: Emily R.
testimonials.content: A perfect spot for both relaxation and adrenaline-pumping rides!
